title: EPL : He so humble - Arteta hails Arsenal star
body_text:
Sport
EPL: He’s so humble – Arteta hails Arsenal star
Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has praised winger Bukayo Saka, describing him as a very humble and committed player.
Arteta made the remarks during his pre-match press conference ahead of Arsenal’s Premier League fixture against Brentford on Saturday evening.
“Bukayo Saka is so humble, so simple and very committed to the club,” Arteta said.
“He has very deep roots connected to win for this football club and with a lot of people here. I am very glad to hear that he wants to stay with us and win with us.”
Saka has continued to impress for Arsenal this season. The England international recently returned from injury and delivered a strong performance in the Champions League quarter-final first leg against Real Madrid.
